TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void HttpWorkerRequest.EndOfSendNotification(HttpWorkerRequest wr, object extraData);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed HttpWorkerRequest/EndOfSendNotification extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: Any additional data needed to process the request.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that Notifies callers when sending of the response is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The host can use this notification to implement buffer recycling.
